about_the_game:
On the shore of the jianghu, you embarked on the path of martial arts. Starting from a nameless nobody, in the shadow of the sword in the cultivation of the world of kung fu, participate in the sects of strife, fighting for the position of the martial arts alliance, with the force and wisdom to shape the legendary martial arts hegemony; or into the court, in the treacherous political vortex around, or become a generation of loyal ministers to support the emperor, or ambition to seek the dynasty usurped the throne, rewrite the destiny of the country, with the strategy and means of the paved the way to the glory of the career path; but also into the sea of commerce, operating You can also join the business world, operate various industries, start from a small store, gradually build a huge business empire, and fight with various merchants to accumulate wealth that can rival the country's wealth.

The rich character development system allows you to freely customize your character's growth trajectory, meet companions with different personalities, or fight alongside them, or develop romantic entanglements. Exquisite graphics present a world of ancient style and charm, vivid plot choices accompanied by intense and exciting battles and strategic challenges, taking you to appreciate the peak of a completely different life experience, to open a unique journey of blood.

Game Features

Rich plot branches: Players are free to choose male or female character perspectives to start the game, experiencing the growth and emotional stories of different gender characters in the jianghu and the court, which greatly increases the replay value and sense of immersion in the game.

Exquisite graphic presentation: Adopting exquisite graphic design, the game delicately depicts a martial arts world with a full flavor of ancient style. From bustling towns to quiet mountains, from solemn palaces to mysterious jianghu sects, each scene is full of details and unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they were in the jianghu full of swords and swordshadows and love and hate.

Diversified combat scenarios: The game has rich and diversified combat scenarios, such as jianghu tournament, gang war, resisting foreign invasion, and conquering the city and land, etc. Different combat scenarios have different rules. Different battle scenarios have different rules and challenges, players need to formulate corresponding battle strategies according to the actual situation.

Character Collection and Interaction: As many as 50 characters with different personalities and distinctive images are portrayed in the game. Players can either choose to raid them and develop a romantic relationship, or take them under their command and let them work for them to help open up new territories and recruit talents. Interacting with these characters not only enriches the game experience, but also provides players with a variety of support and assistance in building their own unique empire.

Omni-directional character growth: With a comprehensive character growth system, players can improve their character's attributes, such as force, intelligence, charisma, etc., by practicing martial arts, learning skills, and completing quests. With the continuous improvement of attributes, the character's ranking in the jianghu and the Rubus ranking will also be updated in real time, so that players can actually feel their own growth and progress, and experience the sense of achievement from a nobody to a famous person.

Game Rules

Dart Board Operation: Players can hire dart masters to manage the daily operation of the dart board. This includes arranging dart masters to escort darts, improving the rank and reputation of the dart board, and expanding the scope of business. By successfully completing dart missions, you will obtain generous rewards and resources, as well as improve the experience and ability of your dart masters.

Recruitment and Use of Famous Scholars: In the game, players have the opportunity to visit famous scholars from all over the world, and win their favor by giving gifts and completing quests, so that they can be used as their own. Each of them has unique skills and attributes, some are good at strategy, some are good at medicine, and some are good at martial arts. They can provide players with powerful support in operation, combat, management, etc.

Gang construction: Establish your own gang and collect apprentices, organize gang activities, complete gang tasks, and enhance the gang's popularity and influence. At the same time, you can also cultivate gang members, improve their strength, and contribute to the development and growth of the gang. The development of the gang not only brings more resources and support, but also establishes its prestige in the jianghu.

Country Management: When the player's strength reaches a certain level, he can acquire small countries and conduct comprehensive political management. This includes developing the country's economy, such as agriculture, industry, commerce, etc.; strengthening military construction, conscripting troops, training armies, and researching and developing weapons; and upgrading culture and education to attract talents. Through reasonable policies and management, the country will prosper and the people will live and work in peace and contentment, and ultimately realize the goal of hegemony.

Skill Matching and Tactical Application: Players can reasonably match skills according to the character's skill characteristics and combat needs, and flexibly utilize them in battle. At the same time, it is necessary to consider the enemy's weaknesses and the battle environment, to develop the best tactics, such as melee and long-range attack coordination, control the timing of the use of skills, etc., in order to achieve victory in battle!

Army Command and War Strategy: When it comes to scenarios such as national wars and large-scale regimental battles, players need to command their own armies to fight. Including the preparation of the army, the matching of troops, the development of battle plans, etc., through reasonable war strategy, such as the east to attack the west, detour encirclement, to wait for labor, etc., to defeat the enemy, to expand their own sphere of influence!

Game Characters

She Yuanming: Minimalist man who loves to cook and hates marriage.

Meng Xinghui: The Landlord's Foolish Son.

Frostbite:Brooding, paranoid, possessive little wolf dog.

Yun Feilan: Lonely fairy who is emo all day long.

You can experience the growth process from an unknown nobody to a martial arts overlord, using force and wisdom to shape a legendary martial arts hegemony, and eventually even ascend to the throne to dominate the world.
